titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Agriculture to make a grant to a member of the land grant university system which completed construction of a biomedical research center in May, 1986, and which has an established trust fund for receipt of operating and construction funds, to conduct human nutrition research.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Department Operations, Research, and Foreign Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition.

committee.subcommittee: Department Operations, Research, and Foreign Agriculture
committee.name: House Agriculture

committee.subcommittee: Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 4/29/1987--Introduced. Requires the Secretary of Agriculture to make a grant under the National Agricultural Research, Extension, and Teaching Policy Act of 1977 to a specified member of the land grant university system to conduct human nutrition research. Authorizes appropriations effective October 1, 1987.
